video_prompt: The miniature man approaches as a golden liquid streams from the spigot. He reaches towards the flow, his expression shifting with intent. The liquid level in the glass visibly rises. Subtle changes in surface reflections occur as the scene unfolds.
image_prompt: A studio photograph of a giant pineapple with a spigot dispensing juice into a glass. A miniature boy reaches for the flowing juice. Plain light gray background, lit from the left, with subtle shadows and reflections on a white surface. Whimsical and creative.
refined_video_prompt: A miniature figure moves closer. Golden liquid streams downward from an unseen source. The figure reaches out towards the falling flow, their expression subtly shifting with intense focus. Liquid visibly rises within a container. Surface reflections continuously ripple and alter.
